name: Balmoral BO Blockout Panel Glide Blind
shortDescription: Balmoral blockout blinds offer elegance and premium design in 13 colors. Ideal for wide windows and sliding doors, they ensure smooth gliding, UV protection, and light control.
tagLine: 100% custom made in Australia within 7 working days.
longHeadline: Elegant Balmoral Blockout Blinds for Smooth Gliding and UV Protection
longDescription:
The Balmoral Armour Blockout Blind is a sophisticated choice for Panel Glide Blinds, ideal for wide windows and sliding doors. Crafted from 100% polyester with an acrylic foam coating, it ensures complete light exclusion and meets AS 2663 1999 blockout standards. Available in a generous 3,000mm width, as well as 127mm and 89mm for vertical blinds, it offers a weight of 390gsm and a thickness of 0.60mm. 

This sliding panel system provides excellent light control, UV protection, and privacy, making it a versatile window treatment. Its track-mounted design allows for smooth operation, with options for wand or motorised control, ensuring a contemporary and minimalist design. The fabric's light fastness is rated ?5 on the Blue Wool Scale, and it meets flame retardant standards for Class 2 to 9 buildings. 

Compatible with blockout, sunscreen, or light-filtering fabrics, it offers thermal efficiency and visual consistency. Easy to maintain with a vacuum or soft cloth, this interior shading solution is perfect for homeowners, designers, and specifiers seeking a coordinated fabric range.
careInstructions: Surface dust can be removed with vacuum or a soft cloth.

Crafted from 100% polyester with an acrylic coating, this blackout fabric is robust, weighing 431gsm with a thickness of 0.65mm. Ideal for roller, roman, and panel blinds, it is PVC and lead-free. With high tear resistance and light fastness (Blue Scale 6), it complies with the Building Code of Australia for class 2 to 9(a) buildings and is fire-tested to AS 1530 Part III. Greenguard Gold certified, it suits sensitive environments like schools and healthcare facilities. Easy to maintain with a soft cloth or duster, it ensures durable performance and a pristine finish.
